Title: A Tittin' and a Hairin'
Writer: Jenji Kohan (creator), Lauren Morelli, Piper Kerman (book), Jordan Harrison (staff writer)
Actors: Taylor Schilling, Uzo Aduba, Danielle Brooks, Michael Harney
Plot: Pennsatucky, Piper, Crazy Eyes, and Lorna get closer with their new admirers. Tensions between Sophia and Gloria, and Alex and Lolly escalate.
